title: ‘Happy for Revenge’: Vingegaard, Van Aert Strike Back for Team Visma in Crucial Algarve Test
content:
Vingegaard leapfrogs three UAE riders for Volta ao Algarve victory, Van Aert hits form with second-place finish, Roglič 'still with work to do' after quiet start to the season.

Read the full article at ‘Happy for Revenge’: Vingegaard, Van Aert Strike Back for Team Visma in Crucial Algarve Test on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
